sen.j: 市川 銀之助（いちかわ ぎんのすけ）は、歌舞伎役者。
sen.e: "Ginnosuke ICHIKAWA" is a name used by Kabuki (a traditional form of drama and music performed by male actors) actors.
sen.cmt: ここで「市川 銀之助」は特定の一人の歌舞伎役者を指すのではなく、名跡のことですので、そのことが明確になるように訳出いたしました。
sen.e: "Ginnosuke ICHIKAWA" is a name used by Kabuki (a traditional form of drama and music performed by male actors) actors.
Ginnosuke ICHIKAWA is a name used by Kabuki (a traditional form of drama and music performed by male actors) actors.
sen.cmt: 文頭の "" 削除しました。

sen.e: He later became Danzo ICHIKAWA the Ninth.
He later became Danzo ICHIKAWA the Ninth.
He later became Danzo ICHIKAWA the Ninth.
He was a son of the first generation.
